channel.title: Shop currency help!
channel.description: I have made warriors guild, almost 100%, and I just need a shop. I know how to add shops, but I don't know how to make it so it accepts only 1 type of currency. Warrior Guild Tokens, NOT Coins. how would you change it so, this is the ONLY shop that accepts the tokens?
